title: Jew Suss - The Rise and Fall
description:
So this is a movie about the making of the now legendary anti-Semitic Nazi propaganda film Jud Suss (aka Jew Suss) that's mainly focused on the chance its lead actor, Ferdinand Marian (Tobias Moretti) took by appearing in the film and the fallout he suffered aftewards. Noted for featuring a scene with the horny, club-footed, Nazi midget Josef Goebbels (Moritz Bleibtreu), the Third Reich's Minister of Propaganda, involving fellatio. Enjoy, or just leave really pissed off comments claiming I'm a Nazi while you pick your nose playing WoW.

Oh, BTW I found this on EUtorrents originally but the SRT. files was fucked up so I manually fixed it for your lazy asses and decided to upload it here. Hope that doesn't get anyone's panties in a bunch.
